attributes.action: To make non school uniform days compulsory
attributes.additional_details: I would like the Goverment to make non school uniform days compulsory for all schools because I think that all students should be able to feel comfortable inntheir own clothes. We should charge a minimal fee of £2 a person towards a charity and any bullying about what other students will receive sanctions.
attributes.background: I would like the Goverment to make non school uniform days compulsory for all schools nationally

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about whether to have days when students aren't required to wear their uniform are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Ban compulsory school uniforms: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639304
